title: The Time Monster
goofs: The Doctor says something unclear when he and the Brigadier get into their cars.

continuity_notes.name: The Doctor
continuity_notes.description: Time Lord protagonist, known for his wisdom and storytelling

continuity_notes.name: The Brigadier
continuity_notes.description: UNIT leader and frequent ally of the Doctor

roots: Star Trek episodes: 'Shore Leave', 'A Taste of Armageddon', 'The Devil in the Dark'
Arthur C. Clarke's The New Serendip
additional_notes: The Doctor shares a story about flowers and hillsides, which is a quote from the Buddhist text Mumonkan, relating to the moment when Buddha held up a flower and Mahakasyapa understood Zen.
